errors.error_description: Installing CellRank before creating and activating the virtual environment, which is incorrect order
correction_candidates: python -m venv cellrank_env && source cellrank_env/bin/activate && pip install cellrank
conda create -n cellrank_env python=3.9 && conda activate cellrank_env && pip install cellrank

python -m venv cellrank_env
source cellrank_env/bin/activate
pip install cellrank
virtualenv cellrank_env && source cellrank_env/bin/activate && pip install cellrank
errors.golden_answer:
python -m venv cellrank_env
source cellrank_env/bin/activate
pip install cellrank

errors.error_description: Using invalid command syntax with non-existent cellrank CLI command and invalid parameters
correction_candidates: python -c "import cellrank as cr; cr.tl.velocity_graph(adata); cr.tl.terminal_states(adata)"
import cellrank as cr; adata = cr.datasets.pancreas(); cr.tl.velocity_graph(adata)
errors.golden_answer: python -c "import cellrank as cr; cr.tl.velocity_graph(adata); cr.tl.terminal_states(adata)"
